data.message: This actually has nothing to do with this post but really need to ask someone and not sure who. I keep getting post telling me to cut and paste something on my page so that Facebook doesn't Share it randomly. I know that anything on social media is able to be seen by police and things like that but surely Facebook isn't going to post my private message on messager just because that can. Please respond I have tried to tell people but since I am so new to the Facebook world nobody believes me.

replies.message: Thanks for the question, Sonja. Our team is aware of this hoax campaign. Please disregard the message and be sure not to release any personal or financial information to the sender. Thanks for checking in with us! -Rhea
oh wow. I should've paid attention. Its a great concept "day of the girl" but its obviously fishing.
